scripts.build:dev: watchify -p browserify-hmr -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 ] ] -t [ vueify ] -e src/app.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.build:prod: NODE_ENV='production' browserify -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015] ] -t [ vueify ] -t [ envify ] -e src/app.js -o dist/index.js
scripts.start: NODE_ENV='development' yarn files & npm run build:dev & cd dist && serve
